yoast_head_json.description: Explore our menu of foodie MTB & E-MTB adventures around the world. Morocco, Canada, Croatia, Italy, Scotland - and more!

@graph.name: Foodie MTB & E-MTB adventures - H+I Adventures
@graph.description: Explore our menu of foodie MTB & E-MTB adventures around the world. Morocco, Canada, Croatia, Italy, Scotland - and more!

@graph.name: H+I Adventures
@graph.description: At H+I Adventures we specialise in crafting life-affirming MTB tours and e-mountain bike holidays in exotic locations around the world. That’s all we do.
